Name: ama
Overview: Automated Music Archiver :: This script will automatically archive music using a popular online DL Client

Enable Automatic Script Start.Name: Enable Automatic Script Start
Enable Automatic Script Start.Description: true = Enabled :: Runs script automatically on startup

Script Interval.Name: Script Interval
Script Interval.Description: #s or #m or #h or #d :: s = seconds, m = minutes, h = hours, d = days :: Amount of time between each script run, when AUTOSTART is enabled

DL Client ARL Token.Name: DL Client ARL Token
DL Client ARL Token.Description: User token for dl client, for instructions to obtain token: https://notabug.org/RemixDevs/DeezloaderRemix/wiki/Login+via+userToken

Download Mode.Name: Download Mode
Download Mode.Description: artist or discography :: artist mode downloads all albums listed as that artist, discography downloads all albums listed as that artist and featured in albums

Related Artist.Name: Related Artist
Related Artist.Description: true = enabled :: Enabling this lets the script crawl your artist list for related artists and process them

Related Artist -> Related Artist (loop).Name: Related Artist -> Related Artist (loop)
Related Artist -> Related Artist (loop).Description: true = enabled :: Enabling this lets the script crawl your related artists for additional related artists and process them accordingly :: WARNING this will cause an endless loop (spider crawling) until no more are found...

Artist Related Count.Name: Artist Related Count
Artist Related Count.Description: Maximum number of related artists to import per artist (20 is max)

Artist Fan Count.Name: Artist Fan Count
Artist Fan Count.Description: Minimum number of fans required for processing

Format.Name: Format
Format.Description: SET TO: ALAC or FLAC or AAC or MP3 or OPUS

Conversion Bitrate.Name: Conversion Bitrate
Conversion Bitrate.Description: FLAC -> OPUS/AAC/MP3 will be converted using this bitrate

Force Convert.Name: Force Convert
Force Convert.Description: true = enabled :: This will convert lossy MP3 to desired target format (exluding FLAC/ALAC, ALAC setting will convert to AAC)

Music Post Process Threads.Name: Music Post Process Threads
Music Post Process Threads.Description: Controls number of threads used for Format conversion and replaygain tagging

Music Embedded Cover Quality.Name: Music Embedded Cover Quality
Music Embedded Cover Quality.Description: Controls the quality of the cover image compression in percentage, 100 = no compression

Album Type Filter.Name: Album Type Filter
Album Type Filter.Description: Filter Types: COMPILE, SINGLE, ALBUM, EP (this is a ', ' separated list of Album Types to skip)

Music Require Quality.Name: Music Require Quality
Music Require Quality.Description: true = enabled :: Requires all downloaded files match target file extension (mp3 or flac) when enabled

Music Replaygain Tagging.Name: Music Replaygain Tagging
Music Replaygain Tagging.Description: true = enabled :: Scans and analyzes files to add replaygain tags to song metadata

Remove Artsit Without Image.Name: Remove Artsit Without Image
Remove Artsit Without Image.Description: true = enabled :: Enabling this will prevent downloading albums from artists with default image (non-unique)

Complete My Artists.Name: Complete My Artists
Complete My Artists.Description: true = enabled :: Eanabling this will add artist id's found in the library directory that are currently not in your list. This will then allow the script archive them accordingly :: !!!WARNING!!! Could cause an endless loop!

Lidarr List Import.Name: Lidarr List Import
Lidarr List Import.Description: true = enabled :: imports artist list from lidarr

Lidarr Url.Name: Lidarr Url
Lidarr Url.Description: ONLY used if Lidarr List Import is enabled...

Lidarr API Key.Name: Lidarr API Key
Lidarr API Key.Description: ONLY used if Lidarr List Import is enabled...

Plex Scan Notifications.Name: Plex Scan Notifications
Plex Scan Notifications.Description: true = enabled :: Plex must have a Music library added and also be configured with the /downloads-ama directory

Plex Library Name.Name: Plex Library Name
Plex Library Name.Description: This must exactly match the name of the Plex Library that contains the Lidarr Media Folder data

Plex Url.Name: Plex Url
Plex Url.Description: ONLY used if NOTIFYPLEX is enabled...

Plex Token.Name: Plex Token
Plex Token.Description: ONLY used if NOTIFYPLEX is enabled...
